member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.ApplicationUpgradeRestartNow
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The application has been upgraded, and will now restart..

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.CantCheckForNewVersionClickOnceDeploymentIsCorrupt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot check for a new version of the application. The ClickOnce deployment is corrupt. Please redeploy the application and try again. Error: {0}.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.CantDownloadNewVersion
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The new version of the application cannot be downloaded at this time.
Please check your network connection, or try again later. Error: {0}.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.CantUpdateLikelyNotAClickOnceApplicationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This application cannot be updated. It is likely not a ClickOnce application. Error: {0}.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.CheckingForUpdates
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Checking for updates..

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.DetectedMandatoryUpdateWillNowInstallAndRestart
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This application has detected a mandatory update from your current version to version {0}. The application will now install the update and restart..

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Update Available.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.UpdateFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Update Found..

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.UpdateInstalled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Update installed..

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.MessageStrings.Updating
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Updating.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Plugins.ClickOnceUpdater.Updater
member.summary: An updater that works for applications deployed using ClickOnce.
